content:
I'm glad I could help you with some recommendations, but I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or interactions with individuals, so I didn't know you had a friend Rachel or a pet Lola.

However, I'm happy to help you with your pet grooming needs! Losing or lending out a pet grooming kit can be frustrating, especially when you need it for your furry friend's next grooming session.

If you do end up needing to buy a new pet grooming kit, I hope the recommendations I provided earlier will come in handy. Remember to consider your pet's specific needs, the quality of the tools, and the price point when making your decision.

Fingers crossed that Rachel returns your original kit soon, but in the meantime, you're prepared with some great options!
